1.0.name: wordpress/flickr-badge
1.0.description:
This plugin creates a Widget to display a customised flickr badge on your WordPress site

You can specify:

  • Title
  • Number of photos to display
  • How to sort photos (Random or Latest)
  • Photo size

You can get public photos from either a flickr user, a flickr group or from the whole of flickr. Photos can also be filtered for a tag, or a user Set ID.

For more information, please visit the plugin page: http://www.tallphil.co.uk/flickr-badge/ You can also see the flickr page for the badge that this Widget embeds: (http://www.flickr.com/badge.gne)
